name: BMT_INFO
description: Table for cellular therapy episode information.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: TX_DISCHARGE_DT
columns.description: Date transplant patient is discharged.

columns.name: TX_EVAL_DT
columns.description: The start date of the transplant evaluation.

columns.name: TX_REV_DT
columns.description: Stores the date when the transplant case was reviewed by the evaluation committee.

columns.name: TX_EPSD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient is a donor or a recipient for the transplant.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DT
columns.description: Date of the admission for the transplant.

columns.name: TX_DT
columns.description: Stores the date of the infusion.

columns.name: MOB_START_DT
columns.description: The start date of the process to increase the number of immature hematopoietic cells in the blood.

columns.name: CND_START_DT
columns.description: The start date of the regimen that will eliminate the individual's ability to make blood cells.

columns.name: HCT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the hematopoietic cell transplantation type.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the blood and marrow transplant diagnosis
entries: Inherited Abnormalities of Erythrocyte Differentiation or Function
Acute Leukemia of Ambiguous Lineage and Other Myeloid Neoplasms
Tolerance Induction Associated with Solid Organ Transplant

columns.name: CELL_PRODUCT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the planned blood and marrow transplant product type. The product type is the source of the cells used in treatment.

columns.name: DONOR_SELECTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor's selection status.

columns.name: DONOR_ELIGIBILITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor's eligibility.

columns.name: DONOR_RELATIONSHIP_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor's relationship to the recipient.

columns.name: DONOR_PREGNANCIES_NUM
columns.description: The number of pregnancies the donor had at time of collection.

columns.name: BMT_CARE_PATH_ID
columns.description: The ID of the child care path associated with this clinical episode.

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_NUM
columns.description: Stores the transplant number.

columns.name: DONOR_SUITABILITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor suitability.

columns.name: DONOR_AVAILABILITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The donor's availability for transplant.

columns.name: PRIMARY_DX_OTHER
columns.description: This diagnosis details when the user selects "other" as the diagnosis.

columns.name: CELL_PRODUCT_OTHER
columns.description: This product details when the user selects "other" as the product type.

columns.name: CURRENT_PHASE_C_NAME
columns.description: Current stage of the transplant.

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Status of the current stage of the transplant.

columns.name: EPISODE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The episode note ID

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_DATE
columns.description: Date of the last transplant stage update.

columns.name: EPISODE_RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The episode status.

columns.name: BMT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the blood and marrow transplant plan.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_DAY_0_DATE
columns.description: The planned or actual Day 0 for the recipient to whom this patient is donating cells.

columns.name: DNR_RELATED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether this donor is related to the potential recipient.

columns.name: BMT_DNR_WORKUP_C_NAME
columns.description: Whether the donor is the primary donor for workup, the backup donor, or neither

columns.name: BMT_DEFERRAL_C_NAME
columns.description: Why the donor is deferred

columns.name: BMT_DEFERRAL_OTHER
columns.description: Free text entry for why the donor is deferred

columns.name: ANC_OVRIDE_DATE
columns.description: Stores override absolute neutrophil count recovery date

columns.name: ANC_NO_REC_YN
columns.description: Stores an override to indicate explicitly that the absolute neutrophil count did not recover.

columns.name: PLT_OVRIDE_DATE
columns.description: Stores override platelet recovery date

columns.name: PLT_NO_REC_YN
columns.description: Stores an override to indicate explicitly that the platelet count did not recover.

columns.name: RECIPIENT_IDENT
columns.description: The ID of the recipient to whom this patient is donating cells. Can hold a CRID. Valid values for an EPT IIT for ICX 110 for subject Recipient are valid values for this item. Note that this item is only used for donor episodes where the recipient is anonymous/unknown.

columns.name: GVHD_MATCH_GRADE
columns.description: The overall graft-versus-host HLA match grade between a BMT donor and their intended recipient.

columns.name: HVG_MATCH_GRADE
columns.description: The overall host-versus-graft HLA match grade between a BMT donor and their intended recipient.

columns.name: HLA_DP_MATCH_C_NAME
columns.description: The match evaluation for the HLA DP results of the donor and recipient.
